Locksmith services we cover

From emergency lockouts to high-security upgrades, explore the specialized services our verified professionals provide.

  1. Emergency Lockouts

    Rapid non-destructive entry solutions when you are locked out of your home or business.

    Find lockout help by location

  2. Burglary Repairs

    Immediate securing of property and repair of damage following a break-in.

    Find repair services by location

  3. Key Extraction

    Removing snapped keys from lock cylinders without damaging the mechanism.

    Find extraction services by location

  4. Lock Changes

    Replacing old or compromised locks with new, secure cylinders (Euro, Mortice, or Rim).

    Find lock replacement by location

Frequently asked questions

How do you vet locksmiths?

We verify every locksmith's credentials, insurance, and trade body memberships. Our team conducts thorough background checks, reviews qualifications, and validates their professional standing with organizations like MLA, NAL, and SafeContractor before listing them on our directory.

Do you cover emergency callouts 24/7?

Yes, our directory includes locksmiths who offer 24/7 emergency services. When you search for locksmiths in your area, you can filter by availability and emergency services to find professionals who can help you any time of day or night.

Are locksmiths insured and DBS checked?

All locksmiths listed on our platform are required to have valid public liability insurance and relevant certifications. Many of our professionals also hold DBS (Disclosure and Barring Service) checks. You can view each locksmith's credentials and certifications on their profile page.
